import { Card, Grid, TextField } from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Col, Form, FormLabel, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' const PboardInsert = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ pprice: 0, ptitle: '', pcontent: '', pimage: '', file: null, fileName: '', uid: '', }) const {pprice,ptitle,pcontent,pimage,file,uid}=form; const onChnageForm = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onChangeFile = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, file: e.target.files[0] }) } return (
) } export default PboardInsert
